description: Number of border edges in all noncrossing rooted trees on n nodes.
links: Index entries for sequences related to rooted trees
formula: n*binomial(3n-5, n-2)/(n-1) for n >= 2G.f.: (1+g-7*g^2+3*g^3)/((1-3*g)*(g-1)^2) where g*(1-g)^2 = x. - Mark van Hoeij, Nov 10 2011
author: _Emeric Deutsch_
